metadata.title: CVE-2016-6332 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.23.15, 1.26.x before 1.26.4, and 1.27.x before 1.27.1,when $wgBlockDisablesLogin is true, might allow remote attackers to obtainsensitive information by leveraging failure to terminate sessions when auser account is blocked.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
